sent.body: Chip: Thanks for the call yesterday. You are now as old as I am, but I am not sure if you are as mature as I am. Happy Birthday, have a great day. Brad

From:   Click at Home @ ENRON   05/07/20001 10:20 PM Sent by: Enron Announcements@ENRONTo: All Enron Employees United Statescc:   Subject: ClickAtHome Portal is HERE!Version 2.0 of the ClickAtHome Portal is now available! sent.subject: Gas Prices
sent.body: Rex: I have an article to fax to you please send me your fax #. I hope all is well in Amarillo. Longhorns look good, this weekend will be a good test for them. Tiff and the kids are great. Both kids are very excited to be in school, lets hope that this enthusiasm last for another 16 years. Brad

sent.subject: Hunting Prices
sent.body: Mary: Please send me prices for the following:- quail lease- quail guided hunt- deer lease- deer guided hunt- duck lease- duck guided hunt thanks brad mckay

sent.subject: NYC Gate Basis
sent.body: Thomas: Can you please answer the following questions:1. What is the NYC Gate volume that can be switched to NYH#6, NYH#2 and Diesel ?2. What utilities have this capability, and what is the volume per utility?3. What is the volume outside NYC that can be switched?4. Explain the mechanism for determining the fuel oil pricingI was at the meeting I had to leave early, thanks Brad

sent.subject: RE: Payment
sent.body: Tad: I think that you should pay what you think you owe and no more. brad

sent.subject: RE: Restricted Algonquin
sent.body: Tom: Can you quickly tell me if the breakout of Algonquin will occur anytime soon. Brad
colovista is good with me, late may is good.brad

sent.subject: Re: Baby Elijah
sent.body: Aunt Kay: Great news. Elijah has been blessed to be a part of such a loving family. I can not wait to see the pictures. Please forward my regards to the to the family. Love to all Brad

sent.subject: Re: Brokered deals with Colonial Energy
sent.body: Who did this deal?

sent.subject: Re: Credit Suisse First Boston
sent.body: Russ:   TCO   .185 /CNG .25 please call me with some feedback. I have some room on the cng. brad

sent.subject: Re: Dove hunt
sent.body: Graydon: I   was thinking i may come into Austin this weekend to do some sking on lake austin, let me know if that is good. Maybe Sat morn. BT

sent.subject: Re: FW: Tab's email.
sent.body: GaryD: Thanks for your help if you have Panus's please give it to me, you keep Rome's. brad

sent.subject: Re: Follow-up from Friday meetings with Enron
sent.body: Greg: I talked to Craig and he wants to bring you back in to meet with Fred Lagratsa. You should hear from Fred or Craig sometime soon   to setup a meeting this week. I never bet on the OWLS, I usually will bet against them unless the spread seems way out of line. Brad

sent.subject: Re: Got the expense check + other
sent.body: Greg: Thanks for the kind words, I only did what you would have done for me. Regarding other job opportunities, I would stick with the organizations that are leading the way. I do not know that much about Sprague. Brad

sent.subject: Re: Happy Birthday.
sent.body: Thanks man I feel like the old man that I am. I only have 5 years until it gets really bad. Hunting was great the dog did great, he tried to attack a bull and went tearing through the brush I thought that I would never find him. After he settled down he did great. Thanks for keeping the family. Tiffany told me that you guys taught her how to CALL THE HOGS. Brad

sent.subject: Re: Harvard- WED
sent.body: Make sure it is after 4:000, I do not want him to sit with me during trading hours. Thanks Brad

sent.subject: Re: Lunch on Thursday???
sent.body: Greg: I will not be able to go to lunch with you, dinner is possible. I would suggest you wear a suit. I am not sure at this point who you will interview with, I should know soon. I will call you 8/23 to talk about Thurs. If you do not hear from me please call me (wk 853-76999, hm 972-1208).

sent.subject: Re: N039555
sent.body: please change the counterparty

sent.subject: Re: New TrueQuote!
sent.body: Thanks for your help. I hope that you were not offended by my comments the other day, they were not directed at you. Brad

sent.subject: Re: Offers
sent.body: Jim: Take mids and add $0.05 for basis and $0.015 for index. Please call if you have any questions. Brad

sent.subject: Re: Offers
sent.body: Jim: Are these basis offers or efp offers?

sent.body: I gave this info to Robin Barbe she will be your contact # 713 853 71777. Brad

sent.body: Can you tell me if i can fly southwest to and from dallas? If I can what would this cost me? Brad

sent.subject: Re: The Deal!
sent.body: Rex: Thanks for the update, I get in around 5:30. I wil get all my stamps and shells this evening. Have a safe hunt see you soon.

sent.subject: Re: Update
sent.body: Craig: I just noticed that you have me partnered with Les instead of Mills. Thanks Brad

sent.subject: Re: WEBS Index Fund
sent.body: Rex: The individual to call is Nelson Murray at 713 286 - 2159, If you need any other info please let me know. Thanks for all of your help. Brad

Anne: It was great to see you, you look great and seem happy. I hope all goes well for you in the year to come. BT

sent.subject: Re: ms150
sent.body: Davis: Sorry for the late payment. I read the same article, the market hates us as much as our customers and competitors do. Brad

sent.subject: Re: (no subject)
sent.body: Mer Mer: I was amazed to see that they had a record of me it must have been when I went streaking through the RICE campus one late night. The campus police told me that they were the only ones with the file and that no one else would have access. What a complete bummer. Should I call the FBI?

sent.subject: Restricted Algonquin
sent.body: I was the one that talked to David Behrman. We talked about splitting out the Algonquin Citygate prices. Why didn't you mention Algonquin in the Gas Daily article?Brad

sent.subject: Taxes
sent.body: Rex: I just wanted to thank you once more for doing our tax return. We realize that this is a very busy time of the year so thanks for your time. I reviewed the return and everything looked great. Have a great time fishing. Brad

sent.subject: re: Sept 14 & 15th Fishing trip
sent.body: Mike: Thanks for the invitation unfortunately I will not be able to attend. Brad
